pages.text: A little bit of carrot, a whole lot of cake. Provides night vision when eaten.
A delightful, delectable dessert deserving decorous devotion. More satisfying than normal cake.
A decoctive delight! Imbues the consumer with the effects of the Potion used to bake it.
A satiating, scrumptious sweet synthesized from sadiroot spice. Cleanses negative status effects when eaten.
It's a harvest feast! Incredibly filling and there's just so much of it.
Smile and say it! Who doesn't love cheese? Can be split into wedges.
A classic harvest-time staple, in pie form. Vegetarian and very filling!
If there are any flavors which make a better pairing, they have not yet been discovered.
A seasoned meal stuffed with various meats. Incredibly filling and tasty!
Raw fish wrapped in rice and seaweed. Super nutritious and quick to eat. Don't tell Direwolf20.
Made with fresh spring produce, it's sure to put a spring in your step as well. Boosts jump height when consumed.
A thick, rich broth full of delicious root vegetables. Boosts maximum health when consumed.
An exhilarating eggplant elixir effervescing with exorbitant experience enhancements. Boosts xp gain when consumed.
